plot: Eurocinema presents award winning feature films paired with shorts from around the world. In this selection we begin with the short film Lullaby immediately followed by our feature Per Sempre.
title: Per sempre
plot_es: Eurocinema presents award winning feature films paired with shorts from around the world. In this selection we begin with the short film Lullaby immediately followed by our feature Per Sempre.

produce.name: Ministero per i Beni e le Attività Culturali (MiBAC)
